ChatProject
Class PublicFileTransfer.PublicFileOUTTransfer

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      ChatProject.PublicFileTransfer.PublicFileOUTTransfer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Enclosing class:
PublicFileTransfer
public class PublicFileTransfer.PublicFileOUTTransfer
extends java.lang.Thread

The PublicFileOUTTransfer class is used for the server side of the transfer file connection which uploads the chosen file to the selected user this job is executed in its own thread it does not interfere with anything

See Also:
Thread

 void run()
          The run method of the class only reads the from the file and writes the data to the socket.Uses byte array to read data and write data the progress bar is updated accordingly to let the user know the upload progress after the file is finished uploading the file input stream closed and a socket stream is flushed then closed the socket is closed right after that as well as serverSocket

Constructor Detail

PublicFileTransfer.PublicFileOUTTransfer

public PublicFileTransfer.PublicFileOUTTransfer()
                                         throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                java.io.IOException
Empty constructor of the class creates needed objects for uploading the file. The socket output stream and file input stream are created then the byte array that we use to upload the data then the progress bar is set to the maximum value which is file size and that value is 100% as we send data we update the progress bar with received data it does the math for us and tells the user how much percent is uploaded

Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - if file is not found this is the exception that will be thrown
java.io.IOException - when working with stream and sockets risks are unavoidable
Method Detail

run

public void run()
The run method of the class only reads the from the file and writes the data to the socket.Uses byte array to read data and write data the progress bar is updated accordingly to let the user know the upload progress after the file is finished uploading the file input stream closed and a socket stream is flushed then closed the socket is closed right after that as well as serverSocket

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
Overrides:
run in class java.lang.Thread
